name: David Ramirez
text: The more intense the groupthink the faster intelligence drops.     We experienced this in a benign way when we'd hang out late into the night and the bigger the group and the more sleep-deprived,  the more our collective intelligence dropped  =P  Well, not really, but it's a mad situation so eh.    Some of our friends are also examples of the danger of letting personal experience overwhelm perspective to the point that neutral data is impossible to consider.
